device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Mounted to wall
devices_included: Any screen device; Tablet; Whiteboard, large vertical display; Tabletop, large horizontal display
contribution_desc:
End-user gesture elicitation study for operations in multi-device environments.
Relatively low agreement scores.
device_models: Apple iPad; Microsoft Surface 2; SMART Board Display
crossdevice_def: "Multi-display environments (MDEs) have advanced rapidly in recent years, incorporating multi-touch tabletops, tablets, wall displays and even position tracking systems. "
